sqlMap.select:
select ZC_HT_CODE,ZC_BI_NO,ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM,ZC_MAKE_CODE,ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM,ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM,ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM,ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM,ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ, zc_bi_sum,zc_bi_do_sum,zc_bi_yjba_sum,bi_target_code,b_acc_code,b_acc_name,co_code,co_name,dec_money,fund_code,fund_name, inceptdoc_code,inceptdoc_name,manage_code,manage_name,nd,org_code,org_name,origin_code,origin_name,outlay_code,outlay_name,payout_code,payout_name, paytype_code,paytype_name,project_code,project_name,project_type_code,project_type_name,senddoc_code,senddoc_name,senddoc_type_code,senddoc_type_name, zc_cg_type,zc_plan_type,zc_save_num,zc_catalogue_code,zc_catalogue_name,zc_year,zc_yep_sum,zc_bi_apd_flag,zc_fund_remark,zc_use_bi_id,zc_fund_file,zc_fund_file_blobid FROM ZC_XMCG_HT_BI MASTER where 1=1
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.insert:
insert into ZC_XMCG_HT_BI (ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_BI_NO, ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM, ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM,ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ, ZC_BI_SUM,ZC_BI_DO_SUM,ZC_BI_YJBA_SUM,BI_TARGET_CODE,B_ACC_CODE, B_ACC_NAME,CO_CODE,CO_NAME,DEC_MONEY,FUND_CODE,FUND_NAME, INCEPTDOC_CODE,INCEPTDOC_NAME,MANAGE_CODE,MANAGE_NAME,ND, ORG_CODE,ORG_NAME,ORIGIN_CODE,ORIGIN_NAME,OUTLAY_CODE,OUTLAY_NAME, PAYOUT_CODE,PAYOUT_NAME,PAYTYPE_CODE,PAYTYPE_NAME,PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_NAME,PROJECT_TYPE_CODE,PROJECT_TYPE_NAME,SENDDOC_CODE, SENDDOC_NAME,SENDDOC_TYPE_CODE,SENDDOC_TYPE_NAME,ZC_CG_TYPE, ZC_PLAN_TYPE,ZC_SAVE_NUM,ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE,ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_YEAR,ZC_YEP_SUM,ZC_BI_APD_FLAG,ZC_FUND_REMARK,ZC_FUND_FILE, ZC_FUND_FILE_BLOBID,ZC_USE_BI_ID) values (#zcHtCode:VARCHAR#, #zcBiNo:VARCHAR#, #zcBiBcsySum:DECIMAL#, #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#, #zcBiYjjsSum:DECIMAL#, #zcBiHtbaSum:DECIMAL#, #zcBiYjchSum:DECIMAL#, #zcBiNzjzSum:DECIMAL#,
SEQ_ZC_PRO_BI.NEXTVAL
#zcProBiSeq#
,#zcBiSum:DECIMAL#,#zcBiDoSum:DECIMAL#,#zcBiYjbaSum:DECIMAL#, #biTargetCode:VARCHAR#,#bAccCode:VARCHAR#,#bAccName:VARCHAR#, #coCode:VARCHAR#,#coName:VARCHAR#,#decMoney:DECIMAL#, #fundCode:VARCHAR#,#fundName:VARCHAR#,#inceptdocCode:VARCHAR#, #inceptdocName:VARCHAR#,#manageCode:VARCHAR#,#manageName:VARCHAR#, #nd:VARCHAR#,#orgCode:VARCHAR#,#orgName:VARCHAR#, #originCode:VARCHAR#,#originName:VARCHAR#,#outlayCode:VARCHAR#, #outlayName:VARCHAR#,#payoutCode:VARCHAR#,#payoutName:VARCHAR#, #paytypeCode:VARCHAR#,#paytypeName:VARCHAR#,#projectCode:VARCHAR#, #projectName:VARCHAR#,#projectTypeCode:VARCHAR#, #projectTypeName:VARCHAR#,#senddocCode:VARCHAR#, #senddocName:VARCHAR#,#senddocTypeCode:VARCHAR#, #senddocTypeName:VARCHAR#,#zcCgType:VARCHAR#,#zcPlanType:VARCHAR#, #zcSaveNum:DECIMAL#,#zcCatalogueCode:VARCHAR#, #zcCatalogueName:VARCHAR#,#zcYear:VARCHAR#,#zcYepSum:DECIMAL#, #zcBiApdFlag:VARCHAR#,#zcFundRemark:VARCHAR#,#zcFundFile:VARCHAR#, #zcFundFileBlobid:VARCHAR#,#zcUseBiId:VARCHAR#)

insert into ZC_XMCG_HT_BI
ZC_HT_CODE
ZC_BI_NO
ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM
ZC_MAKE_CODE
ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM
ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM
ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM
ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM
ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ
)
values
#zcHtCode:VARCHAR#
#zcBiNo:VARCHAR#
#zcBiBcsySum:DECIMAL#
#zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#

#zcBiHtbaSum:DECIMAL#

#zcBiNzjzSum:DECIMAL#

)
sqlMap.update:
update ZC_XMCG_HT_BI
ZC_HT_CODE = #record.zcHtCode:VARCHAR#
ZC_BI_NO = #record.zcBiNo:VARCHAR#
ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM = #record.zcBiBcsySum:DECIMAL#
ZC_MAKE_CODE = #record.zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#
ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM = #record.zcBiYjjsSum:DECIMAL#
ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM = #record.zcBiHtbaSum:DECIMAL#
ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM = #record.zcBiYjchSum:DECIMAL#
ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM = #record.zcBiNzjzSum:DECIMAL#

update ZC_XMCG_HT_BI set ZC_HT_CODE = #record.zcHtCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_BI_NO = #record.zcBiNo:VARCHAR#, ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM = #record.zcBiBcsySum:DECIMAL#, ZC_MAKE_CODE = #record.zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM = #record.zcBiYjjsSum:DECIMAL#, ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM = #record.zcBiHtbaSum:DECIMAL#, ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM = #record.zcBiYjchSum:DECIMAL#, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM = #record.zcBiNzjzSum:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select: SELECT MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE, MASTER.ZC_BI_NO, MASTER.ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM, MASTER.ZC_MAKE_CODE, ( SELECT sum(ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI.ZC_BI_BCJS_SUM) FROM ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI where ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI.Zc_Ht_Bi_No = MASTER.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ AND ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI.Zc_Ht_Code = MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE ) as ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM, MASTER.ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, MASTER.ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM, MASTER.ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, MASTER.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ FROM ZC_XMCG_HT_BI MASTER WHERE MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE = #zc_ht_code#
sqlMap.delete: delete from ZC_XMCG_HT_BI BI where BI.ZC_HT_CODE=#zc_ht_code#
sqlMap.select: SELECT MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE, MASTER.ZC_BI_NO, MASTER.ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM, MASTER.ZC_MAKE_CODE, (SELECT sum(ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI.ZC_BI_BCJS_SUM) FROM ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI where ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI.Zc_Bi_No = MASTER.Zc_Bi_No AND ZC_P_PRO_BAL_BI.Zc_Ht_Code = MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE) as ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM, MASTER.ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, MASTER.ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM, MASTER.ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, MASTER.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ, (select nvl(zc_bi_jhua_sum, 0) from zc_p_pro_mitem_bi where ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ = MASTER.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ) - (select nvl(sum(ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM), 0) from zc_xmcg_ht_bi ht where ht.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ = MASTER.ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ and ht.ZC_HT_CODE != MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE) zc_Can_Use_Sum, zc_bi_sum, ZC_USE_BI_ID FROM ZC_XMCG_HT_BI MASTER where ZC_HT_CODE = #ZC_HT_CODE:VARCHAR#

select ZC_HT_CODE,ZC_BI_NO,ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM,ZC_MAKE_CODE,ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM,ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM,ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM,ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM,ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ, zc_bi_sum,zc_bi_do_sum,zc_bi_yjba_sum,bi_target_code,b_acc_code,b_acc_name,co_code,co_name,dec_money,fund_code,fund_name, inceptdoc_code,inceptdoc_name,manage_code,manage_name,nd,org_code,org_name,origin_code,origin_name,outlay_code,outlay_name,payout_code,payout_name, paytype_code,paytype_name,project_code,project_name,project_type_code,project_type_name,senddoc_code,senddoc_name,senddoc_type_code,senddoc_type_name, zc_cg_type,zc_plan_type,zc_save_num,zc_catalogue_code,zc_catalogue_name,zc_year,zc_yep_sum,zc_bi_apd_flag,zc_fund_remark,zc_use_bi_id,zc_fund_file,zc_fund_file_blobid FROM ZC_XMCG_HT_BI MASTER where ZC_HT_CODE=#ZC_HT_CODE:VARCHAR# order by zc_pro_bi_seq
